description: Purchase of office furniture to Ottawa, Ontario. Delivery between 2024-12-16 and 2024-12-20. Installation between 2025-01-02 and 2025-01-14.
tags: Transportation, CustomS-Country of origin and warranty
full_summary:
# EP916-250194 - Request for Bid (RFB) for CAT 6 Workspaces

## Solicitation Details

* **Reference Number**: WS4629694816-Doc4635567226
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4629694816
* **Publication Date**: 2024-06-14
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-07-08T14:00:00 (UTC)
* **Amendment Number**: 3

## Description

This Request for Bid (RFB) is issued under the general Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-140003/C. The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking bids for the purchase and installation of office furniture to meet the requirements of the Government of Canada.

The bid covers the procurement of office furniture, under Product Category 6, to be delivered between December 16 and 20, 2024, and installed between January 2 and 14, 2025.

A security requirement is associated with this bid.

## Eligibility

This bid is open to all eligible vendors, pursuant to the government's procurement policies and procedures.

## Tender Evaluation Criteria

* Lowest Price

## Contact Information

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact Person**: Nancy Sell (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email**: nancy.sell@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Tender Documents

Tender documents and bid instructions can be accessed at the Discover and Access (D&A) platform:

* [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20023062?extsite=MjAwMjMwNjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20023062?extsite=MjAwMjMwNjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

## Notice

Please ensure you carefully review the tender documents and bid instructions before submitting your bid. Your bid must be received by the tender closing date and time to be considered. Note that this bid has already expired, but details are still provided for informational purposes.
